p: Moreover, the deficiency of DJ-1 inhibits the aggregation of alpha-synuclein and increases the resistance to insulin in rats [ 148]. Likewise, PINK-1 deficiency, present in PD, also favors resistance to insulin [ 30]. Hence, mutations of alpha-synuclein, DJ-1, and PINK-1 are important related factors that may favor the development of T2DM in PD patients.
